snippet: The No. 1 movie at North American theaters was a holdover: "The Possession" (Lionsgate) took in an estimated $9.5 million, for a two-week total of about $33.3 million.
abstract: The No. 1 movie at North American theaters was a holdover: "The Possession" (Lionsgate) took in an estimated $9.5 million, for a two-week total of about $33.3 million.

headline.main: A Slow Weekend at the Box Office
headline.print_headline: A Slow Weekend At the Box Office
